edu.nyu.cs.javagit.client
Interface IGitStatus

All Known Implementing Classes:
CliGitStatus
public interface IGitStatus

An interface to represent the <git-status> command.

Method Summary
 GitStatusResponse getSingleFileStatus(java.io.File repositoryPath, GitStatusOptions options, java.io.File file)
          Return status for a single File
 GitStatusResponse status(java.io.File repositoryPath)
          This method returns GitStatusResponse object with no options passed to <git-status> command.
 GitStatusResponse status(java.io.File repositoryPath, GitStatusOptions options)
          This method returns GitStatusResponse object after parsing the options and then executing the <git-status> command.
 GitStatusResponse status(java.io.File repositoryPath, GitStatusOptions options, java.io.File file)
          This method returns GitStatusResponse object after parsing the options and then executing the <git-status> command.
 GitStatusResponse status(java.io.File repositoryPath, GitStatusOptions options, java.util.List<java.io.File> paths)
          This method returns GitStatusResponse object after parsing the options and then executing the <git-status> command.
 GitStatusResponse status(java.io.File repositoryPath, java.util.List<java.io.File> paths)
          This method returns GitStatusResponse object after parsing the options and then executing the <git-status> command.
 GitStatusResponse statusAll(java.io.File repositoryPath)
          This method returns GitStatusResponse object with options set to all(-a).
 

Method Detail

status

GitStatusResponse status(java.io.File repositoryPath,
                         GitStatusOptions options,
                         java.util.List<java.io.File> paths)
                         throws JavaGitException,
                                java.io.IOException
This method returns GitStatusResponse object after parsing the options and then executing the <git-status> command.

Parameters:
repositoryPath - Path to the root of the repository
options - GitStatusOptions Options passed to <git-status> command
paths - List of files or file-pattern
Returns:
GitStatusResponse Response object returned by <git-status> command.
Throws:
JavaGitException - Thrown when there is an error while running the <git-status> command.
IOException - There are many reasons for which an IOException may be thrown. Examples include:
  • a directory doesn't exist
  • access to a file is denied
JavaGitException
java.io.IOException

getSingleFileStatus

GitStatusResponse getSingleFileStatus(java.io.File repositoryPath,
                                      GitStatusOptions options,
                                      java.io.File file)
                                      throws JavaGitException,
                                             java.io.IOException
Return status for a single File

Parameters:
repositoryPath - Directory path to the root of the repository.
options - Options that are passed to <git-status> command.
file - File instance
Returns:
GitStatusResponse object
Throws:
JavaGitException - Exception thrown if the repositoryPath is null
java.io.IOException - Exception is thrown if any of the IO operations fail.
